responses: GDSC hosts a variety of events and workshops throughout the year, focusing on Google technologies and development practices.
These include coding workshops, tech talks, hackathons, and study jams.
Participation is open to all students who are interested in technology, regardless of their degree program.
Events are designed to help members learn new skills, collaborate on projects, and prepare for technology careers.
